div.p: System used for TNM classification. Includes the following codes: SCT#444256004 'American Joint Commission on Cancer, Cancer Staging Manual, 6th edition neoplasm staging system (tumor staging)' SCT#443830009 'American Joint Commission on Cancer, Cancer Staging Manual, 7th edition neoplasm staging system (tumor staging' #AJCC8 'American Joint Commission on Cancer, Cancer Staging Manual, 8th edition neoplasm staging system (tumor staging)' SCT#258235000 'International Union Against Cancer (tumor staging)'
